price: 8. Waxay doonayaan (gaaladu) inay Nuurka Alle  (Xaqa) ku damiyaan afafkooda. Alle se waa taam yeeli Nuurkiisa haba naceen gaaladuye.
arabic: يُرِيدُونَ لِيُطۡفِـُٔواْ نُورَ ٱللَّهِ بِأَفۡوَٰهِهِمۡ وَٱللَّهُ مُتِمُّ نُورِهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yurīdūna liyuṭ'fiū nūra al-lahi bi-afwāhihim wal-lahu mutimmu nūrihi walaw kariha al-kāfirūna
